mapper.insert: INSERT INTO survey(surveyno, topic, sdate, edate, s_number, is_continue, poster, poster_saved, poster_thumb, poster_size) VALUES (survey_seq.nextval, #{topic}, #{sdate}, #{edate}, #{s_number}, #{is_continue}, #{poster}, #{poster_saved}, #{poster_thumb}, #{poster_size})
mapper.select: SELECT surveyno, topic, sdate, edate, s_number, is_continue, poster, poster_saved, poster_thumb, poster_size FROM survey ORDER BY surveyno DESC
